Comment: This is a WtW mini tournament game against a player quite a bit stronger than me. A dubious choice in the opening left him behind material, and he never managed to get it back. Anyway, this is my highest non-blitz victory. The forced moves end on move six for black.

This is the choice I marked as maybe not great, as it allows my to take his rook for my knight. The only advantage is that it doesn't get his king out in the opening. But then again, easy19 played this move and beat my in seventeen.

I know, I know, my knight was more active than the bishop, but I didn't see anything else to do with the knight, and this close to the endgame a bishop is pretty strong, especially once it gets out of the pawn wall.

Here I offered a draw because while I was ahead, his bishop was no longer in danger and a draw was pretty good for me against someone this strong. I wouldn't have done it against someone weaker though.
He declined it.
